text: The Island on Bird Street () is a 1997 Danish World War II drama movie directed by Søren Kragh-Jacobsen and stars Jordan Kiziuk, Patrick Bergin, Jack Warden, Stefan Sauk, Simon Gregor, James Bolam, Sian Nicola Liquorish, Suzanna Hamilton. == Other websites == * * * Category:1997 drama movies Category:1990s war movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Søren Kragh-Jacobsen Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in Poland
title: The Island on Bird Street (movie)
